storyInfo: Rhodes Island gets tickets to see the grand finals. The Blood Knight, who has cleaved his way through the competition in the name of the Infected, is finally going to face off against Nearl in the grand finals.

attributes.content: Alright, let's wrap it up!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Does it still hurt?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Nope. Never been better.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Looks like your arm has made a complete recovery. The Wind Knight suddenly forfeiting was a huge help.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret! I've finished upgrading your swordspear!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I tried incorporating some Minoan techniques: maintaining excellent Arts transmission on one side, and using a special polymer coat to improve concentration on the other––
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: In any case, this'll make your weapon both lighter and sharper!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hah, used just about everything in my shop to boot.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You have my assurances, this is the best sword– err, lance? Right, swordspear, that we've ever made.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: The sword you won your first championship with was the second best. And that warhammer you took with you was the third best.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hah, don't mention it!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Zofia, these are all the records I've found on the Blood Knight's matches.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Good. Time is of the essence.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret, we have to go into this fully prepared. Margaret?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Thank you... All of you, for supporting me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This may well be our final mission, Monique.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Are we really going to attack the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The Board is still split. We'll have Platinum do the dirty work.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And Darksteel also authorized the attack? Why? After this is over, why would we still be concerned with the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I don't know. Maybe Darksteel felt threatened by the Radiant Knight... Since the Board is on the same page, that works out nicely.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: They're already wary of us. Until Darksteel gives us the signal, we would do well to avoid exposing ourselves.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: In any case, let's just pray that the Blood Knight can defeat the Radiant Knight. That'd make things a whole lot easier for all of us.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Who do you think has a better chance of winning?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It's hard to say...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I, I'm going to be the commentator for the finals? Me?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The numbers don't lie, Mob. You are now one of the top tournament commentators. Congratulations.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Additionally, you've been a part of the Nearl sisters' story since Maria. The Board of Directors also sees this as a selling point, and hopes to work with you more.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Have you seen the latest issue of 'Knights Illustrated?' You've been dubbed 'The Voice That Walks With the Light.' You're now a household name.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: R-Really?!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And lest we forget... Your bonus will be credited to your account tomorrow. There will be something else for you, after the Major.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Does that mean I'll finally be able to bring my parents to the Grand Knight Territory?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Of course. You could buy them a huge villa, if you want.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...tickets... to the finals?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's help has been instrumental to this year's Kazimierz Major. We've learned much from you in terms of dealing with Oripathy.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: The winner of this year's Major will be decided between the Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight—a final match between two Infected.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: As such, I believe that Rhodes Island should be there to watch this unprecedented final match.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Also, if I'm not mistaken, those two Sarkaz ladies over there are quite close to Margaret, yes?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Thank you for your generosity.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Nearl... She'll win, right?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You'll have to see for yourself, young lady.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: So we have four tickets...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You've got to go, Amiya.;As leaders of Rhodes Island, we can't afford to miss this.

attributes.content: You have to come with me too, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And naturally, I'll have to come along to ensure Doctor's safety.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That leaves us with two...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I really want to see Nearl's dazzling performance, but the medic team is kind of tied down...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But! Doctor, Amiya, you two should go for sure!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And if Shining and Nightingale go as well, that makes four!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I can't just leave the medic team like that.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Major is about to end anyway, so there aren't as many people who need treatment!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Besides, didn't the Doctor do a wonderful job for the Infected here? I imagine the situation will be pretty stable for a while–
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If I were in Nearl's shoes, I'd be heartbroken if none of my friends came to support me during the finals!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hehe, you have a point.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Liz, do you want to see Nearl's victory?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Mhm...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya... Please allow us to join you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The finals are between the Blood Knight and the Radiant Knight
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No matter who wins... the next champion will be one of us.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The Area 0 conspiracy has been brought to light, and the one behind it has stepped down. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has promised you asylum, and you can start your life anew.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It really is a fairytale ending, huh?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ––But that's not really the case, is it?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Looking at today's news, discussions about the Infected continue. The Armorless can be dealt with. The K.G.C.C. can be dealt with. But how can we deal with the public's fear of Oripathy?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You fought against the K.G.C.C. and the Union. But the latter is just a group of sellswords, and the former is the foundation of modern Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Flametail Knight, Sona.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Is this all it takes?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Something's been on my mind recently, Toland. Since you aren't from the Grand Knight Territory, you might have a better sense of this than we do.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Can we really improve the lives of the Infected just by defeating the K.G.C.C. and the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Honestly, can we even really defeat the K.G.C.C.?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.text: One who competes for wealth and glory.

attributes.content: A Minoan clad in blood-red armor! A warrior from the frontier of storms, a Forte of boundless might!
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: Put your hands together fooooor... independent knight... DIIIKAAAIOOPOOOLIIIS!!!
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: Oi, Minoan, your name is too hard to remember!
attributes.name: A Spectator

attributes.content: Cave the other guy's head in! I believe in you!
attributes.name: A Spectator

attributes.content: ...... (Exhales)
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Let the match–– BEGIIIIIN!!
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: ...Listen, Minoan. You're an Infected.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: We've managed to hide it, and you've been able to scrounge up a bit of recognition in the underground arena.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Now there are several knightclubs in the Grand Knight Territory that are interested in you... This is a prime opportunity to make a lot of money.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: As long as you get noticed by one of those big-name knightclubs, we're gonna go to the moons, I tell you!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But! There's no way they would let an Infected become a knight. In a small pond like ours, we might be able to hide it, but once we go to the Grand Knight Territory, it'll be too risky.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: So what's your plan?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: So! We pretend to sign a contract, then have you compete a few rounds and make some quick cash. Then we'll have you get 'injured' and withdraw from the tournament...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: As for the official medical documentation, I'll try to grease some palms. We've gotta coordinate this thing perfectly! Right, Di–– Err...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Just call me 'Minoan.'
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: No need to remember my name.
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: For your sake, you really should change your name to something strong and powerful-sounding, and easy to remember. Even a stage name is fine. You get me?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Let's get going! Onwards, to the Grand Knight Territory!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Unbelievable! Who would've expected this newcomer to take down Whitemaple Knight?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Look at that blood-red armor and that deadly crimson edge! He condensed his blood into a mighty weapon that even a swift and agile competitor like Whitemaple Knight could not evade!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Incredible strength! Awe-inspiring physique! Exceptional situational awareness! All in a sensational-looking package that is sure to sell!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: There's no need to wait for the judges! Without a shadow of a doubt, the winner is–– Blazingaxe Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: *Pant*... *Pant*...
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Pffft––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Th-The Major?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Did you forget what we–– *cough* *cough*... Too many people here...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No way! Absolutely not! Do you remember how the previous champion ended up leaving Kazimierz?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Margaret Nearl, the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Yes, her! Born into a long line of heroes! The youngest champion in history! But did any of that add up to anything?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: One sentence – 'She's an Infected,' and she's expelled from Kazimierz. The entire Nearl family, gone like dust in the wind.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Don't joke around like that. We need to behave ourselves and––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Sir, are you Blazingaxe Knight, Dikaiopolis?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Oh, and who might you be...?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Are you... his manager?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Haha, something like that.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Ahh, wonderful. How fortunate.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: My name is Czarny, and I'm a spokesman for the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...The Crimson Chalice Knightclub?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Yes... A knightclub established specifically for you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You are an Infected. But when it comes to managing public opinion, I always prefer dredging to blocking.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: What do you think about this title? 'Kazimierz's Blood-Red Chalice.' This will be your iconic advertising slogan.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: A chalice, huh. Such an elegant image doesn't suit someone as rough and unrefined as me.
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: Don't say that.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: As for the other members... It might even be possible to make an entire order of Infected knights. But that would depend on what happens next.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Why would you go out of your way to do this? Aren't ordinary people afraid of the Infected?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: That's why 'ordinary people' never amount to anything.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Then, if the Infected can become knights, why was the Radiant Knight exiled?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: How did the spectators feel about that?
attributes.name: Dikaiopolis

attributes.content: I do believe... that's where I come in, Dikaiopolis.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: The second Infected knight to cut his way through the Major! From Minos, Dikaiopolis! Over the last two years, 'Kazimierz's Blood-Red Chalice' has become a household name!
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: Blazingaxe Knight's meteoric rise in both rank and popularity has been impossible to deny! His blood-red armor, his raw, visceral strength! He is, without a doubt, a true knight!
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: Next, let me introduce you to his opponent for this round... independent knight Viviana Droste––
attributes.name: A Commentator

attributes.content: The... Blood... Knight?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Yes. The Knights Association has just issued your official title.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Your proposal... a path for the Infected to gain official entry into the tournament, has been great reference material. As we speak, the Board is moving to make it a reality.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You and your Crimson Chalice Knightclub may well be the pilots for this new program. At the same time, this is also a declaration to all the Infected in Kazimierz that we have not given up on them.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Hopefully, this can keep the Infected problem from boiling over.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Spokesman, will the Infected still face discrimination, even after becoming knights?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Unfortunately, they will. I can say this with near certainty.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No matter when or where, people will always dread this disease. If you want them to change their views, you must resort to radical methods.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: If it's just the disease, there's nothing wrong with being afraid of a disease.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But the Infected are also victims, and Infected knights are still knights.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Being a victim is also a part of the disease. As for the status of knighthood... Do you still not understand?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The medical community has never stopped researching Oripathy, but... progress has been too slow. The general view is that Oripathy cannot be understood in our current theoretical framework...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: However, the good news is the Board of Directors is at least willing to meet with you and discuss your suggestions.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Come join my knightclub.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You... You're the champion?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Come with me, and we can live a normal life.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But... we aren't that strong...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I don't need you to accomplish anything special... For them, just having me is good enough.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Ahaha... I thought I was going to get exiled, and die alone in the wilderness...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: But now, not I still stay in the city, and I can even stay in the same knightclub as the champion––
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'll lay down my life for you! Thank you! Thank you so much!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You are our saving grace, Blood Knight! Long live the Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Long live the Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.text: Long live the Blood Knight! Long live the Blood Knight!

attributes.content: ...Let's go.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You came here to get a glimpse of the Blood Knight?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Just a glimpse is enough.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We still have to follow our own path.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This is unbelievable! Can you believe your eyes?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Because I sure can't! The Radiant Knight has suddenly entered the fight! The Knights Association that let it happen! Oh my god, I, this—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I've never seen a situation like this in all my years of commentating! Though I don't know how the National Council will react, it doesn't change the fact that they won!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: So that... is the Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: For what reason... did you come back?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: This place is always bustling.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Congratulations on making the finals, Sir.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The deciding battle between you and the Radiant Knight will be upon us soon. Afterwards, the championship ceremony will be held here, and the champion will personally memorialize the victory––
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ––But, as you are the champion, this should all be familiar to you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The Major grows in size and scope each and every time. I don't like the bloated tournament formats and awards ceremonies you've tacked on.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Sorry about that.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Has the portrait of the Radiant Knight been hung back up?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Yes. The Knights Association has reaffirmed the Radiant Knight's status, and she has been reinstated as Kazimierz's champion.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...May I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Of course, spokesman.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You and the Radiant Knight are both Infected. What do you think of her?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: She is a magnificent failure.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Her defiance. Her willpower. Her formidable abilities. In these areas, she is magnificent.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But because she accomplished nothing with all that... she is a failure.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: To demonstrate her conviction, or to maintain her glory, she allowed herself to be exiled, dragging her entire family down.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Was she really able to protect even a single person?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You don't seem to see eye-to-eye with her?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: These are two separate questions, spokesman.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Does she need me to see eye-to-eye?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The finals! Now this is a matchup worth the money!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight versus the Radiant Knight... I can't even imagine what kind of match this is going to be!!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: My, oh my. So this is Kazimierz's famous knights' banquet? I must say, it indeed lives up to its reputation.
attributes.name: A Leithanian Noblewoman

attributes.content: What kind of battle will we see between these two knights?
attributes.name: A Leithanian Noblewoman

attributes.content: Haha, the land of the knights always has some surprises up its sleeves, madam. All we need to do is wait and see.
attributes.name: A Leithanian Nobleman

attributes.content: Just half an hour until the round starts!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: We've got a ton of spectators. Hey, use Section C as a guide for how to lead people in! Fill up Section I last!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Ah! Sorry, Sir, it's just too crowded––
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Are our preparations complete? Good.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Remember what Malkiewicz said. Regardless of whether or not the Radiant Knight wins, add that line into the final announcement.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Rhodes Island? They came to watch the match too? I see, under the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's name... That's fine.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Pay utmost attention to security. Also, keep an eye on the movement of the campaign knights.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Um, spokesman? Your further instructions?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Sorry... Give me a moment.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: ...Madam Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It's been a while. What can I do for you?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: 'I've let you down.'
But, those words do not escape his lips.
McKee's hand seems to be fumbling about in midair, as if trying to buy some leeway for his chagrin.
But in the end, he gives up.
...I hope you enjoy the finals.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: –– (Ancient language) The young hunter sets out on his Khaganquest ♪
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: –– (Ancient language) From dreams he goes, towards the shores of gold ♪
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: –– From dreams he goes, towards the shores of gold ♪
A halberd in hand, stained red with blood of kin ♪
Drowning in the bright moon's sorrow ♪
Until the black night paints over his vision ♪
Until a tower of bone stands erect in his heart ♪
Until hemlock chokes his hazy home ♪
O, the hunter is bound to flame by ashes ♪
O, the hunter's soul sleeps in the eye of the spring ♪
From the lighthouse did the longbow loose ♪ But with its arrows of bonfires and dawn ♪
Upon the dead has the bone urn been splashed ♪ But the father still waters white cocoons under the tree ♪
We made it! But, it's so crowded! Though you could've guessed that just from what was on TV.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya, hold my hand.;Stay close to me. Don't get separated in the crowd.

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Over here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Nightingale, you should be careful as well.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right now, it's exactly 8 o'clock in the Grand Knight Territory! Welcome to the 24th Grand Finals of the Kazimierz Major! As always, it's your old buddy Greatmouth Mob here!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: After countless hardships and struggles, after countless victories and defeats, Kazimierz will, tonight, crown yet another champion after three long years!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Don't expect much sleep in the land of Kazimierz tonight! A new hero and a new legend will be born!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Countless eyes are on us from all over the world! Knight enthusiasts from Columbia, Victoria, Leithanien, you name it, all are paying rapt attention to tonight's match!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And tonight's match, yes, in a single night, will shatter countless records! The number of concurrent viewers! The total amount of traffic! Single-day sales!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––But that's not all! The most, most, most, most important thing of all... are the knights! Take a good look, every single one of you lucky spectators! Tonight, even the Minoan goddess of war will have to concede!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: For the first time in over two decades, two champions will clash in the grand finals!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Two champions! Two of the greatest knights Kazimierz has ever seen!! Anybody lucky enough to be here to witness this historic event—make sure to etch every moment of this night into your memory!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Because from now on, you all will be a part of the greatest moment in the history of the Kazimierz Major!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The two contenders for the championship require no introduction! But rules are rules, so I've got to waste a few of your precious minutes! First, let me introduce you to––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The defending Champion of the Major, 'Kazimierz's Blood-Red Chalice,' the Blood Knight of the Crimson Chalice Knightclub –– DIKAAAAAAIOOOPOLIIIIIIS!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A suit of crimson armor emerges from the shadows and takes its place beneath the light.
The hero has no flashy moves. He simply stands in the arena, feeling the temperature of the soil and the humidity of the air.
The Blood Knight lifts his head slightly. He can hardly see the night sky from beneath the blinding array of light.
The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Spectating Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight. He is the one who created a path to knighthood for the Infected?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I had no idea... he was this kind of warrior.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just listen to those deafening cheers.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining, he's the one they call their hero?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.options: Even if we know very little about him, I can't deny that he is a hero.;......;Even if he stands in Nearl's way, I can't deny he's a tough opponent.

attributes.content: And on the other side!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The young legend! The heir of a great hero! Bearer of a thousand glories and former occupant of the Throne of Champions, only to be exiled in the blink of an eye! A tragedy in the hearts of countless people!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But none of that matters now! She is the youngest champion in the history of the Major, the quickest to achieve the rank of Grand Knight, an independent knight who rose to the highest honor in the land––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The legend on everyone's lips... now walks before us once more! Please welcome the light-bringing pegasus, the Radiant Knight––MAAAARGAREEEEEET NEEEAAAAAAAARRRLLL!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Two Infected, two champions, two Grand Knights! This match will be one for the history books! A matchup so exciting your heart might leap out of your chest!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's now my pleasure to announce...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The deciding Grand Finals of the 24th Kazimierz Major! BEGIN––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on?! The Blood Knight suddenly took off his helmet! This usually only happens after the match is decided––!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight. I'm very glad you've made it here.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: A lot of people do not understand your choices, but I do.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You wish to become a beacon. You know that you alone cannot tear down this era–– And if you could, it would be meaningless.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Therefore, you cast your own light forth to illuminate a path forward for others, in the hope that those who are forced to kneel will straighten their backs, to let the oppressed choose their own destinies.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Your dedication is most honorable, Radiant Knight. From your eyes, I cannot see even a speck of the so-called dust of ideals.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Many heroes do strive to act out of justice, but do it too hastily, in a way that is only self-serving.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: No, I was surprised.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: After I returned to Kazimierz, I met a number of knights who still held onto their faith.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: They haven't lost themselves to modernity. From them, I can still see the embers of glory flickering.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Virtue will always exist. This city is not so rotten to that extent, but––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ––Virtue alone cannot change this era.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: On this decadent knights' stage, there is only one thing I want to prove.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That even now, true knights still exist.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That beauty, honor, and justice... still exist here––
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ––Indeed, those things, that spirit, are like gems. You illuminate those gems, and wait for others to pick them up again.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: That is your greatest limitation, Margaret.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Dedication, sacrifice, and fighting for justice are of course noble and righteous. For this, I admire you.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But these things, the spirit of knighthood, may not be enough to save this complex era.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You handed a pickaxe to the weak and taught them to break down walls of stone. But you never taught them how to build a new home.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Or rather–– You never told them: While they can choose a new path, there are many different paths they can take.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Nngh––!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Blood Knight suddenly launches the first attack! In terms of range, the Radiant Knight's swordspear should undoubtedly have the advantage! But right now–– Wait a minute!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's Blood Arts! After the axe swing, he's immediately following up with a spear of blood from his left hand––?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (She blocked it––?)
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I'm not done yet!
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: Guh!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A burst of light! It's the Radiant Knight's Arts! In the opening moments of the match, it's an Arts against Arts showdown! I can't see what's going on, but the two are clearly already going at it hard!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What precise Arts control, and to throw it out so instantly... Unbelievable.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: This couldn't have been achieved through ordinary training... No, there's no way you can learn skills like this from the arena...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Is it military training? Fighting rampaging beasts on the wastelands?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I can say this for sure, Margaret. You now shine like the sun in the sky.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: ––In every duel you fight... Against the Nightzmora, against the Candle Knight... Are you always this calm?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Look at you. This is the first time I've seen your expression on the battlefield––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: My expression?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Much less burdened than I expected, Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've given it some thought as well. If I returned to the arena only to see decadence and decay, whether or not I'd be shaken.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But now, I am firm in my beliefs.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Though we should probably put that conversation aside for another time.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The eyes of the two knights meet.
The power beneath their armor roils restlessly, strong convictions flaring in their hearts.
Now is not the time to talk about the future.
Now is the time to decide a winner.
